actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide readjustment assistance to workers and firms supplying essential parts or services, or extracted minerals, to import-impacted firms.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to revise the eligibility requirements for adjustment assistance for workers and firms to make workers and firms eligible for such assistance if such firms provide essential parts or services, or supplies extracted minerals, to articles adversely affected by increased imports.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide readjustment assistance to workers and firms supplying essential parts or services, or extracted minerals, to import-impacted firms.
